text: This popular Japanese restaurant offers reasonably fresh sashimi, making it a solid choice for Japanese cuisine lovers. However, the Salmon Kabuto Shioyaki was overly burnt (as seen in the photo), though they promptly replaced it with another, which was appreciated. The refillable green tea was a nice touch, and the service was not bad overall. A decent dining experience with room for slight improvements.

Waitress: Jacquelyn
Very friendly staff and helpful, explained very well how to use the UOL voucher. Fast in service, and the food tasted good.
We had a good time dining in Ichiban Boshi United Square. Jacquelyn was very helpful & patience when explaining the details on rewards redemption.
Great tasty Japanese cuisine with very fresh sashimi.. They often have seasonal specialties which gives the menu a good variety.. Friendly service from the staff in a cozy relaxing setting..
We came at lunch time. Luckily there is no queue and we are seated very fast. We ordered sushi hand roll, ramen and kids meal. We all love the food.
